website_summaries.verdict: While the set is centered around the sprawling cityscape of Ravnica, you’d be pleasantly surprised at the wide variety of cruel goblins, merciless vampires, and other creepy locals to play with.
pros: Includes 36 booster packs, with 540 total cards
There are 259 cards to collect in this series, and they are themed around the heroic, villainous, and beastly factions of Ravnica
cons: 259 is a large number of cards to collect, and while you’ll have no problem making several custom decks with 540 cards, you likely won’t have the entire Guilds of Ravnica series with 1 booster box

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a scam
customer_reviews.text: Opened 0 Mythics for 36 packs. Some of the cards had scratches and some of the packs were already partially opened. Felt really sketchy and will not be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: What even happened to these poor packs
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but I’m pretty mad about the damaged cards and packs
customer_reviews.author: The Tech

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: Every pack was glued, not one uncommon, rare or foil. They went out of thier way sooo far as to put 10 cards in the packs, some from other sets...then at the end of the caper they just gave up and threw it in the box...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Ever
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we were blown away by the quality. Our box came factory sealed and my husband was psyched- each booster pack was like a whole new gift on Christmas ... just sometime in like... September. The rares were great, then we came across a mythic rare or 3.... and TWO PLAINSWALKERS! We could not have had a better batch of boosters if we had handpicked them when told what was inside. Great special lands, unique common and uncommon cards, heck, 4 of our kids play so even if they had just been average we could have just let them use the card to practice building their decks... instead we got TWO PLAINSWALKERS AND MULTIPLE MYTHIC RARES!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: beautifullyderangedmommy

customer_reviews.title: Got it for 96 at release. That was ok.
customer_reviews.text: 96 at release was ok when the prices were pretty high. Now they have flattened hard. Just skip this and buy the singles on tcg player. If you like opening boxes, get them at release or on deep discount.
customer_reviews.author: jake jake

customer_reviews.title: guilds of ravnica
customer_reviews.text: Great item came in early which is a huge plus. This set makes for some crazy deck building variations. Truely enjoyed opening the packs and got some awesome pulls from this box can not wait to start deck building. Waiting on my favorite guild yet orzov on the hopefully on the next set
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: The product is overall good. There are a lot of bulk mythics and rares in here, which isn't too good. Don't buy it if you want to make money. The box came factory sealed (RETURN IF YOU DONT SEE THE WIZARDS LOGO ON THE PLASTIC WRAPPER). The card quality of magic cards in general seems to have gone down too. Some cards were slightly curled right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: null

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it all, just didn't love it is all. Took longer to arrive then initially stated.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tiegs

customer_reviews.title: Happy child,  happy mother
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son wanted. No complaints here. Delivery was promted and packaged with no damage to box.

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what it was supposed to be!
customer_reviews.text: I had some good cards from this box. Doomwhisper and Assassins Trophy. Also quite a few other cards. I’m sorry to hear others have received boxes that weren’t sealed or packs that were opened and cards taking out but I didn’t deal with that problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Seliga

customer_reviews.title: Prefect gift for magic freaks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves magic so he was so excited to recieve this for Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Great return in value for me!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Doom whisperer, assassins trophy, Aurelia, sacred foundry, risk factor, experimental frenzy, mission briefing, March of the multitudes, in the first 12 packs so far!! I haven't even finished opened the last 24 and with the first 12 rares/mythics, I calculated a $92 return for the $98 I paid for this box. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alex I.

customer_reviews.title: great deal for the cards
customer_reviews.text: i got 8 mythics and some really good rares,vraska golgari queen,emmara soul of the accord,etrata the silencer and amazing pics on all of the cards

customer_reviews.title: Good Pulls.
customer_reviews.text: Good Pulls. More than made my money back. One of the better series to release.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Christmas gift for my girlfriend. I ordered this booster box on Friday, expected delivery said the following Monday. I received this package the day after I ordered it. The quickest delivery. Sealed box. No damages. 5 out of 5!

customer_reviews.title: Possible Tampering
customer_reviews.text: Although I got 2-3 mythics, the box seemed to be tampered with, packs seemed to just be effortless to open, it has seemed to be resealed. I only pulled 1 foil. I won’t be purchasing this product again. I definitely feel as if it was tampered.

customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Worst booster I've ever opened
customer_reviews.text: Aurelia, March of the Multitudes, Mnemonic Betrayal. ONLY 3 MYTHICS??? and terrible ones at that + very few good rares. Not worth 90$, ABSOLUTELY worthless booster box. My cards valued at about 62$ - Total loss, no trophy, no vraska, all worthless I got more value out of buying 6 packs at my local MTG store at their marked up prices. Did they skim the box for all the good packs and give me crap??? That's what I feel like I got. I'm avoiding this at all costs.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Magic: The Gathering Guilds of Ravnica Booster Box
product_meta.description: A booster box contains 36 booster packs of guilds of Ravnica, the follow-up to the hit expansions core Set 2019 and dominaria. Each booster pack contains 15 magic cards (540 cards total). pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!
feature_bullets: STAND WITH YOUR GUILD. Ravnica is one of Magic’s most beloved settings, where guilds jockey for power and control and multicolored cards show up in force. New takes on Ravnica classics like Guildmages and split cards await.

BUILD DECKS. A booster box contains 36 booster packs of Guilds of Ravnica, the follow-up to the hit expansions Core Set 2019 and Dominaria. Each booster pack contains 15 Magic cards (540 cards total). Pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!

PLAY AT HOME. Your Guilds of Ravnica booster box holds enough packs to host your own booster draft with as many as twelve friends. (Note: a booster draft requires more basic land cards than a booster box includes.)

PLAY THE ORIGINAL. Magic: The Gathering is the first modern collectible card game. Magic has inspired more than 20 million fans over 25 years, from the first dragons and angels to today’s planeswalkers and Commander decks.

JOIN THE FAMILY. Wizards of the Coast has been making the world’s best strategy games for almost 30 years: Magic: The Gathering (MTG), Dungeons & Dragons (D&D), many board games under the Avalon Hill umbrella, and more. Explore them all, discover new favorites, and make new friends along the way.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
